summary: Every year we audit IRS's financial statements. During our FY 2020 audit , we found that corrective actions were not complete for 114 recommendations we made to address previously reported deficiencies in IRS's financial reporting and related information systems. We also identified new deficiencies related to system access controls, security management, and tax credits. We made recommendations to IRS to address these new issues, such...
title: Management Report: Internal Revenue Service Needs to Improve Financial Reporting and Information System Controls
